Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Lee's mission log, volume 28.1... I'm carrying out an operation on my own. This footage is for my personal use only. Refer to Gray Raven's mission report for actual details.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Greenwich Mean Time 07:07. These mechanoid guards are all lined up facing the "golden light beam." They are... saluting something.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "The objective of this solo operation was to search for my missing teammate Liv. Now, however, I'm stuck here...", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Although they\'re not moving, I have detected a "current web" in the air. Based on my analysis, half a step out there is enough for the mild current to catch my whereabouts...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Whoever designed this "current web" knows that salutation is when the defense of this area is at its most vulnerable. That\'s why...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I can only lie here... As long as they don't move, I can't move either.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...59 seconds have passed. Some mechanoids are beginning to move, but the web is still here...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I\'ve deduced that this "shift pattern" exists because of the differences in their mechanoid models.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Based on their appearances, I've cross-referenced their data with the database on me. The mechanoids who have moved first are all more advanced models.", 4: '1'}
